title: Vampire Mountain: The Saga of Darren Shan Book Four
description: FOR USE IN SCHOOLS AND LIBRARIES ONLY. Darren and his master, Larten Crepsley, make a pilgrimage to the Halls of Vampire Mountain to meet with the generals and princes in charge. The road is perilous, of course, and getting to their destination is only half of the problem.
author: Darren Shan
